source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 18,854 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ragged Harvest Golem's Pauldrons

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ragged Harvest Golem's Gloves

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,477 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,244 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 623 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Vishanka, Jaws of the Earth
